Question
========

Given that y is a stochastic variable with mean 50 and sd 6. We take a sample of 4 realizations of this y. The standard deviation of the sample mean (sd) is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.5
* 3
* 9
* 18

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.5: Incorrect
* 3: Correct
* 9: Incorrect
* 18: Incorrect
